name: vscode-taskexplorer
description: Tasks management for npm, vscode, yarn, ant, gradle, grunt, gulp, batch, bash,php composer, make, maven, python, perl, powershell, ruby, pipenv, nsis, jenkins.  Supports external task providers via API.

scripts.clean: npm run clean:extension && npm run clean:webviews && npm run test:clean
scripts.clean:webviews: rimraf res/css && rimraf res/js && rimraf res/page
scripts.test-single-mws-ant: npm run test-default_build && node ./dist/test/runTest.js ant xDeactivate --multi-root
scripts.test-single-mws-file_cache: npm run test-default_build && node ./dist/test/runTest.js fileCache xDeactivate --multi-root
scripts.test-single-mws-file_watcher: npm run test-default_build && node ./dist/test/runTest.js fileWatcher xDeactivate --multi-root
scripts.test-single-mws-multi_root: npm run test-default_build && node ./dist/test/runTest.js multiRoot xDeactivate --multi-root
scripts.test-single-mws-tasks: npm run test-default_build && node ./dist/test/runTest.js tasks xDeactivate --multi-root
scripts.test-single-sws-ant: npm run test-default_build && node ./dist/test/runTest.js ant xDeactivate
scripts.test-single-sws-app_publisher: npm run test-default_build && node ./dist/test/runTest.js appPublisher xDeactivate
scripts.test-single-sws-bash: npm run test-default_build && node ./dist/test/runTest.js bash xDeactivate
scripts.test-single-sws-batch: npm run test-default_build && node ./dist/test/runTest.js batch xDeactivate
scripts.test-single-sws-composer: npm run test-default_build && node ./dist/test/runTest.js composer xDeactivate
scripts.test-single-sws-configuration: npm run test-default_build && node ./dist/test/runTest.js configuration xDeactivate
scripts.test-single-sws-external_provider: npm run test-default_build && node ./dist/test/runTest.js externalProvider xDeactivate
scripts.test-single-sws-file_cache: npm run test-default_build && node ./dist/test/runTest.js fileCache xDeactivate
scripts.test-single-sws-file_watcher: npm run test-default_build && node ./dist/test/runTest.js fileWatcher xDeactivate
scripts.test-single-sws-gradle: npm run test-default_build && node ./dist/test/runTest.js gradle xDeactivate
scripts.test-single-sws-grunt: npm run test-default_build && node ./dist/test/runTest.js grunt xDeactivate
scripts.test-single-sws-gulp: npm run test-default_build && node ./dist/test/runTest.js gulp xDeactivate
scripts.test-single-sws-jenkins: npm run test-default_build && node ./dist/test/runTest.js jenkins xDeactivate
scripts.test-single-sws-infopage: npm run test-default_build && node ./dist/test/runTest.js infoPage xDeactivate
scripts.test-single-sws-licensemgr: npm run test-default_build && node ./dist/test/runTest.js licenseManager xDeactivate
scripts.test-single-sws-makefile: npm run test-default_build && node ./dist/test/runTest.js makefile xDeactivate
scripts.test-single-sws-maven: npm run test-default_build && node ./dist/test/runTest.js maven xDeactivate
scripts.test-single-sws-menu_commands: npm run test-default_build && node ./dist/test/runTest.js menuCommands xDeactivate
scripts.test-single-sws-multi_root: npm run test-default_build && node ./dist/test/runTest.js multiRoot xDeactivate
scripts.test-single-sws-no_scripts: npm run test-default_build && node ./dist/test/runTest.js noScripts xDeactivate
scripts.test-single-sws-npm: npm run test-default_build && node ./dist/test/runTest.js npm xDeactivate
scripts.test-single-sws-nsis: npm run test-default_build && node ./dist/test/runTest.js nsis xDeactivate
scripts.test-single-sws-perl: npm run test-default_build && node ./dist/test/runTest.js perl xDeactivate
scripts.test-single-sws-pipenv: npm run test-default_build && node ./dist/test/runTest.js pipenv xDeactivate
scripts.test-single-sws-powershell: npm run test-default_build && node ./dist/test/runTest.js powershell xDeactivate
scripts.test-single-sws-providers: npm run test-default_build && node ./dist/test/runTest.js providers xDeactivate
scripts.test-single-sws-python: npm run test-default_build && node ./dist/test/runTest.js python xDeactivate
scripts.test-single-sws-release_notes: npm run test-default_build && node ./dist/test/runTest.js releaseNotes xDeactivate
scripts.test-single-sws-ruby: npm run test-default_build && node ./dist/test/runTest.js ruby xDeactivate
scripts.test-single-sws-tasks: npm run test-default_build && node ./dist/test/runTest.js tasks xDeactivate
scripts.test-single-sws-tree: npm run test-default_build && node ./dist/test/runTest.js tree xDeactivate
scripts.test-single-sws-tree_grouping: npm run test-default_build && node ./dist/test/runTest.js treeGrouping xDeactivate
scripts.test-single-sws-typescript: npm run test-default_build && node ./dist/test/runTest.js typescript xDeactivate
scripts.test-single-sws-webpack: npm run test-default_build && node ./dist/test/runTest.js webpack xDeactivate
scripts.test-single-sws-webview: npm run test-default_build && node ./dist/test/runTest.js webview xDeactivate
scripts.test-single-sws-workspace: npm run test-default_build && node ./dist/test/runTest.js workspace xDeactivate
scripts.test-single-sws-wrapper: npm run test-default_build && node ./dist/test/runTest.js wrapper xDeactivate
scripts.test-single-sws-util: npm run test-default_build && node ./dist/test/runTest.js util xDeactivate
scripts.test:before: npm run test-default_build && npm run test:before_2
scripts.tsc-build_test: npx tsc -p tsconfig.test.json && npm run webpack-build:webviews:dev
scripts.tsc-rebuild: rimraf dist && npm run tsc-build && npm run tsc-build_types
scripts.tsc-rebuild_test: rimraf dist && npm run tsc-rebuild_types && npm run test-default_build
scripts.tsc-rebuild_types: rimraf types/tsconfig.tsbuildinfo && rimraf types/lib && rimraf node_modules/@spmeesseman/vscode-taskexplorer-types/lib && npm run tsc-build_types

commands.title: Task Explorer: Show Log in Output Window

explorer/context.when: explorerViewletVisible && filesExplorerFocus && !explorerResourceIsRoot && !inputFocus && resourceScheme == file && resourcePath in vscodeTaskExplorer.taskFiles
explorerViewletVisible && filesExplorerFocus && !explorerResourceIsRoot && !inputFocus && resourceScheme == file && resourcePath not in vscodeTaskExplorer.taskFiles
explorerViewletVisible && filesExplorerFocus && !explorerResourceIsRoot && !inputFocus && resourceScheme == file && resourcePath in vscodeTaskExplorer.taskFiles
explorerViewletVisible && filesExplorerFocus && !explorerResourceIsRoot && !inputFocus && resourceScheme == file && resourcePath not in vscodeTaskExplorer.taskFiles

pattern.regexp:
^The terminal process *["']?([A-Za-z\.0-9\/\-_\\]+) +([A-Za-z \.0-9\/\-_\\"']+) +(?:failed to launch \(|terminated with )exit code\:? *([0-9]+)\s*(?:\.|\))[
]{2,3}^(.+)
^('(.+)' is not recognized as an internal or external command)
